summary: Examines the role of the bottled water industry and its effects on our health, climate change, pollution, and our reliance on oil.
cast: Sally Bethea|Earl Blumenauer|Amanda Brown|Eugene Brown|Robert Bullard|Suzie Canales|Ruth Caplan|Howard Dearborn|Joe Doss|Emily Fletcher|Shirley Franklin|Wenonah Hauter|Mike Herndon|Jane Houlihan|Melissa Jarrell|Stephen King|Dennis Kucinich|Barbara Lippert|Bridie McGreary|Betty McLaughlin|David Michaels|Bobi Miller|Jim Miller|Charles Moore|Merrigail Owen|Wayne Owen|Adrianna Quintero|Lauren Robin|Elizabeth Royte|Frederick Vom Saal|Dennis Sabourin|Horace Smith|Craig Stevens|Cat Warren|Iwilla Washington|Ruben Washington|Jim Wilfong|Christopher Williams
title: Tapped
